convertRules:
# have fun converting!
'defi |' -> 'Definition |\n\n: '
'prop |' -> 'Proposition |\n\n: '
'lemm |' -> 'Lemma |\n\n: '
'theo |' -> 'Theorem |\n\n: '

'rem |' -> '**Remark**: |'
'obj |' -> '**Objection**: |'
'def |' -> '**Defense**: |'

'reduc |' -> 'We prove this by reductio. |'

# Selection Insert Rules
'"'  -> '"' + '"'
'<'  -> '<' + '>'
